DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess feasibility efficacy electronically-mediated , pregnancy postpartum , behavioral intervention program , compare usual obstetric care , change weight cardiometabolic biomarkers among overweight obese Black woman .
DOC.brief_title: Healthy4Baby : Preventing Postpartum Weight Retention Among Low-Income , Black Women
DOC.detailed_description: Black woman particular need obesity prevention treatment . Targeting childbearing period potential slow accumulation weight gain among high risk group . Previous intervention prevent postpartum weight retention among Blacks sparse limit poor intervention adherence , high attrition , failure include pregnancy study design . The propose research aim overcome shortcoming develop intervention 1 ) focus solely Black woman , 2 ) incorporate Black mother ' information need , value , social context , 3 ) use technology facilitate participant engagement , 4 ) include pregnancy postpartum period .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant AfricanAmerican woman least 18 year age 2 . BMI recruitment 25.044.9 kg/m2 3 . Singleton pregnancy 4 . Gestational age ≤ 20 week determine last menstrual period 5 . Plan carry pregnancy term keep baby 6 . Own cell phone text messaging plan 7 . Member Facebook social networking site 8 . Able participate physical activity 9 . Participants must willing comply studyrelated procedure 1 . BMI ≤ 24.9 ≥ 45.0 2 . Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 160 diastolic blood pressure > 95 mmHg ) . Participants control hypertension medication least three month allowable . 3 . Known atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease 4 . Known congestive heart failure 5 . Known diabetes mellitus ( type 1 type 2 ) 6 . Uncontrolled thyroid disease . Participants control thyroid disease medication least three month allowable . 7 . Known cancer 8 . Any major active rheumatologic , pulmonary , hepatic , dermatologic disease inflammatory condition require steroid immune modulate medication 9 . History test HIV positive 10 . Current smoker tobacco user 11 . Current recent history ( past 6 month ) drug alcohol abuse dependence 12 . Participation weight control investigational drug study within 6 week screen 13 . Serious unstable medical psychological condition , opinion investigator , would compromise subject 's safety successful study participation 14 . Gastrointestinal Disorders ( gallbladder disease , Crohn 's disease , etc ) 15 . Previous weight loss surgery 16 . History bulimia anorexia
